   tasmai deva namasye'haṃ bhavate'suramāraye | 72 |	tasmE deva namasye aham Bavate asuram Araye | 72 |
   samastadevajanakavāsudevaparāmṛta |	samasta deva janaka vAsudeva para amRtaH |
   vḸasudeva parāmṛta j ñḸanamūrte namo'stu te | 73 |	vḸasudeva para amRta j QḸana mUrte namaH astu te | 73 |
   devāde devalokapa pūrṇānandamahodadhe |	deva Ade deva lokapa pUrNa Ananda mahodaDe |
   sarvajñeśa ramānātha devā'de'de'va lokapa | 74 |	sarvajQa ISa ramAnA aTa devAH ade ade ava lokapaH | 74 |
   yo nirmame'śeṣapurāṇavidyām |	yaH nirmame aSeza purANa vidyAm |
   yo nirmameśe ṣapurāṇavidyām |	yaH nirmameSe zapurANa vidyAm |
   yonirmameśeṣapurā'ṇavid yām |	yoniH mama ISeza purA aNavit yAm |
   yo'nirmame'śeṣapurāṇavid yām | 75 |	yaH anirmame aSeza purANa vid yAm | 75 |
   anantapārāmitavikrameśa prabho ramāpāramanantapāra |	ananta pAra amita vikrama ISa praBo rama apAram anantapAra |
   mahāguṇāḍhyāparimeyasattva ramālayāṇseṣamahā'guṇāḍhya | 76 |	mahA guNa AXya aparimeya sattva ramAlayANseza mahA aguNAXya | 76 |
   bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā	BAs BAs BAs BAs BAs BAs BA
   bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā	BAs BAs BAs BAs BAs BAs BA
   bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā	BAs BAs BAs BAs BAs BAs BA
   bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā bhā | 77 |	BAs BAs BAs BAs BAs BAs BAs | 77 |
   naiva paraḥ keśavataḥ paramādasmāt samaśca sukhakeśavataḥ |	na eva paraH keSavataH paramAt asmAt samaH ca suKa keSavataH |
   so'yaṃ śapathavaro naḥ śaśvat sandhāritaḥ suśapathavaro'naḥ | 78 |	saH ayam SapaTa varaH naH SaSvat sanDAritaH su SapaTa varaH anaH | 78 |
   kṛṣṇakatheyaṃ yamitā suśatīrthenoditā'nane yaṃ yamitā |	kRzNa kaTA iyam yamitA su Sa tIrTena uditA anane yam yamitAH |
   bhaktimatā parameśe sarvodrekā sadānutā'pa rameśe | 79 |	BaktimatA parameSe sarva udrekA sadA anutA apa rameSe | 79 |
   iti nārāyaṇanāmā'va katīrthe pūjitaḥ surāyaṇanā mā |	iti nArAyaNa nAmA ava katIrTe pUjitaH surAyaNanA mA |
   pūrṇa guṇairdhika pūrṇajñḸanecchābhaktibhiḥ svadhikapūrṇaḥ | 80 |	pUrNa guNEH Dika pUrNa jQḸana icCA BaktiBiH su aDika pUrNaH | 80 |
   iti śrīmadānandatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviracitam	iti SrImat Ananda tIrTa Bagavat pAda AcArya viracitam
   śrīmadyamakabhārataṃ sampūrṇam	SrI mat yamaka BAratam sampUrNam
   bhāratīramaṇamukhyaprāṇāntargata śrīkṛṣṇārpaṇamastu	BAratI ramaNa muKya prANa antargata SrI kRzNa arpaNam astu
